span.span: The type of exception that the block is handling.

summary.span: 활동의 해당 Try 블록에서 예외가 발생한 후 실행할 동작을 포함합니다.

span.span: Contains the actions to be executed after an exception is raised in the corresponding Try block of a activity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 디자이너에서 한 번 배치 활동 디자이너에서 다시 정렬할 수 없습니다.Once placed in the designer, activities cannot be reordered in the designer. 컬렉션의 순서를 변경 하려면 활동을 삭제 하 고 올바른 순서로 다시 추가할 하거나 워크플로에 대 한 xaml (코드) 뷰를 사용 합니다.To reorder the collection of activities, either delete and re-add them in the correct order, or use the xaml (code) view for the workflow. ## Examples 다음 코드 샘플에서는 활동을 만드는 방법을 보여 줍니다.The following code sample demonstrates creating a activity. 이 예제에서는 [순서도 활동 사용 하 여 TryCatch에서 오류 처리](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) 샘플.This example is from the [Fault Handling in a Flowchart Activity Using TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) sample. [!code-csharp[wfs_FlowChartWithFaultHandling#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wfs_flowchartwithfaulthandling/cs/program.cs#1)]

span.span: The handler for the exception being caught.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 예외 처리기는 개체로 표현됩니다.The exception handler is represented by a object. ## Examples 다음 코드 샘플에서는 활동의 Action 속성을 할당하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.The following code sample demonstrates assigning the Action property of a activity. 이 예제에서는 [순서도 활동 사용 하 여 TryCatch에서 오류 처리](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) 샘플.This example is from the [Fault Handling in a Flowchart Activity Using TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) sample.
